name: Elena Marchiori
content: Elena Marchiori (Index) Webpage of Elena Marchiori Professor of Machine Learning Head of the Data Science Group, Institute for Computing and Information Sciences (iCIS), Radboud University Nijmegen, The Netherlands. Contact information Email: elenam AT cs DOT ru DOT nl Postal address: Postbus 9010, 6500 GL Nijmegen, The Netherlands Visiting address: Mercator I, Toernooiveld 212, 6525 EC, Nijmegen. Room: Mercator I 02.05A Phone: +31-(0)24 36 52647 Fax: +31-(0)24 36 52728 Research topics My current research concerns machine learning, in particular deep learning, and transfer learning. I am interested in the study and development of effective methods for specific applications, in diverse domains, notably bio-medical sciences, through collaborations within multi-disciplinary projects. Recent projects I am involved in: MOCIA (Maintaining Optimal Cognitive function In Ageing), and MARBLE (sMARt Breast cancer detection with deep LEarning). For a list of publications see my Google Scholar profile.
